name: Squared
description:
A small grid-based puzzle game where you take control of a square. Move around the blocks and walls, change gravity and overcome obstacles to reach the Exit Portal.


-Contains 100 Levels
-Takes about 1 - 2 hours to complete

Controls


~Arrow keys, W/A/S/D keys || gamepad stick, d-pad~
Move around blocks and walls

~Space || A-button, B-button~
Change Gravity

~P key || start button~
Pause Game

~F key || select button~
Toggle Fullscreen
